Hi Ron,

I'm at work and my Taikan is at home. I have printed it out and will let you
know what I find.

G
  -----Original Message-----
  From: Ron Polansky [mailto:yamabrp@...]
  Sent: Monday, May 05, 2003 11:34 PM
  To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
  Subject: [nihontostudy] Mino Daido


  All:

  I was wondering if someone had a Mino Taikon that had a matching mei:
  Shinano (no) Kami Fujiwara Daido
  http://www.nihontophile.com/Daido1.jpg (nakago rubbing)
  http://www.nihontophile.com/Daido2.jpg (picture of blade)
  (hada is tighter than most Mino I have seen)

  I was wondering which generation?
  (judging by the sori, etc., I was guessing 1st generation...blade
  looks early Shinto)

  Thanks for the help!
  Ron
